attributes.action: Commission research on replacing the houses of parliament with holo-conferencing
attributes.additional_details:
The time and cost of making Parliament fit for purpose is far too high:
http://uk.reuters.com/article/2015/06/18/uk-britain-politics-parliament-idUKKBN0OY1YT20150618

This petition only asks for research into the possibilities this technology as well as modern virtual reality provide, the risks and rewards and how they could transform national politics.
attributes.background: Parliament is a symbol of the nation but a £5 billion+ refit is excessive + shows it is no longer fit for purpose. A virtual parliament could holographically project debate into civic spaces, cut costs, improve voting, attendance + access to data. Our parliament would once again lead the world.
